about_the_game:
UsoNatsu ~The Summer Romance Bloomed From A Lie~ Voice Drama: "A tale of basically cohabiting♡ What'll happen next?"

STORY


After overcoming many challenges, Kaoru and Shiori finally start going out together. Now that Shiori is living by herself, Kaoru comes by to visit and sort of ends up living there as well. Thus begins their sweet and lovey-dovey days spent together... but in the midst of summer vacation and living by herself, Shiori is in an unexpected state of mind...?

CAST

Kaoru Tachibana (CV: Makoto Koichi)
Shiori Minagi (CV: Manaka Iwami)

STAFF

Scenario: Akeo
Character Design: Shio Koji
Music: Yua（next marginalized progress）
Planning/Development: LYCORIS

content_descriptors.notes: Audio drama contains the following: suggestive language, references to a romantic relationship between a student and a teacher, partial nudity, alcohol and tobacco use, references to physical abuse, self-harm and suicide and other mature themes not suitable for all ages.
